title: AE插件-地形海拔轮廓等高线动画 Topograph v1.0.2 Win/Mac + 视频教程
author: 大众脸
content: Topograph插件在After Effects中创建地图和地形的等高线样式动画，此效果可让您根据素材创建独特的设计动画。它可以用于视频或单帧图像上设计交互式的图形动画。Topograph brings elevation maps and topography to After Effects! This effect lets you create unique designs and animations from your footage. It can be used for animating and for designing on one frame with interactive feedback.

other.update_info: v1.0.2更新内容：支持 AE 2020；修复了与网络用户相关的许可问题
